meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1184.

td.p: Paula Long, a secretary from Glendale, California
Larry Linsey, a graduate student from Hollywood, California
Steve Berman, a film executive from Santa Monica, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $17,400)

tr.td: U.S. CITIES
TEXTILES
PROVERBS
SPORTS
CHARACTERS IN PLAYS
CARTOONISTS

"Well, my daddy left home when I was three /

Just this old guitar and an empty bottle of booze..."')

"Playboy" cartoonist Shel Silverstein composed the following No. 2 hit for Johnny Cash:
"Well, my daddy left home when I was three /
And he didn't leave much to ma and me /
Just this old guitar and an empty bottle of booze..."

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Steve] It\'s almost an acronym for the names of Neil Armstrong, Buzz Aldrin, and Michael Collins, armalcolite, and you\'d find it on [*].)
PaulaWhere is Colorado?
$1,800
LarryWhat is the Holy Land?
$2,000
SteveWhat is a coal mine?
$4,000
the Moon')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Where you\'d naturally find armalcolite, named for the 3 men who 1st handled it')

tr.td: WORD ORIGINS
Where you'd naturally find armalcolite, named for the 3 men who 1st handled it
Steve
Larry
Paula
3-day champion: $21,800
2nd place: a trip to Phoenix and a week at the Arizona Biltmore+Jeopardy! box game or computer game
3rd place: Magnavox Moviemaker camera+Jeopardy! box game or computer game
Steve
Larry
Paula

30 R
(including 2 DDs),
4 W
(including 1 DD)

8 R,
4 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
